settings.shippingtext: Free shipping on all orders over $99!

meta.description: Italiano is another great addition to BigCommerce Theme Collection from 1Center. It is a perfect Mobile-Friendly theme that will equally perform well on all other devices. Italiano comes with the three different style where you can easily customise size of container, elements, fonts, color, etc.
